qas.question: Which contestant was saved by the judges in season nine of American Idol?
At what point did the judges use their save on American Idols ninth season?
Who was the first American Idol contestant to return to the show as a mentor?
How much money was brought in by the Idol Gives Back special on season nine of American Idol?
Who was saved with the Judges' Save?
Which former contestant was a mentor this season?

context: <a0_0><a4_0>Michael Lynche<a4_0/><a0_0/> was the lowest vote getter at <a1_0>top nine<a1_0/> and was given the Judges' Save. The next week Katie Stevens and Andrew Garcia were eliminated. That week, <a2_0><a5_0>Adam Lambert<a5_0/><a2_0/> was invited back to be a mentor, the first Idol alum to do so. Idol Gives Back returned this season on April 21, 2010, and raised <a3_0>$45 million<a3_0/>.
